result.reason: Allowing users to exclude specific tree branches from search results is a reasonable UX enhancement that fits naturally into the existing IModelFilter-based search architecture.
result.approach: Add an ExcludeFromSearch bool property to ContainerInfo; modify ConnectionTreeSearchTextFilter to skip nodes whose ancestor containers have that flag set; expose a right-click context menu toggle; persist the flag in the XML serializer/deserializer.

attempts.raw_output:
